root: ^Chief: I have heard it all. I congratulate you and thank you on behalf of the people of our village. We can never pay your debt, but I'll give you 10000 gold coins.
^Chief: What are you going to do now?

s: ^I'd better spend a few days around here and rest.

c-0: ^Chief: All right, I'll get you a place.
c-1: ^Chief: I wish you good fortune in these.
